title: FS: Lot of 74 Low/Mid-Grade T206 Many HOF/SL Lajoie, Brown, Collins FINAL PRICE DROP
author: marcdelpercio

posts.post_title: FS: Lot of 74 Low/Mid-Grade T206 Many HOF/SL Lajoie, Brown, Collins FINAL PRICE DROP
posts.post_content:
Hello. I have the following lot of T206 cards for sale. These are all low to mid-grade cards, ranging from poor to VG/EX, as the scans will show.

*NOTE* My scanner does not work well with graded cards, so if you would like better pics of any of the graded ones, I can send those to you separately.

Please add $4 shipping (USPS Ground Advantage which includes $100 insurance) for 1-2 cards. For 3 or more, I will cover shipping. Prices listed are net to me, via any payment method you prefer.

Please send me a PM or e-mail to [url]marcdelpercio2000@yahoo.com[/url] to purchase any cards or with any questions. Thanks for looking!

CARDS PICTURED (removing SOLD cards from list for easier viewing):

Bescher (print anomaly with missing ink spot on left side) - $50
Collins - $275
Evers - $200
Freeman - (Sweet Caporal 350/25...tough combo) $50
Kleinow - $100
Miller - $110
Bump for a price drop on the remaining cards.  Still two Lajoie portraits, Collins, Brown, Chesbro, Joss, Bresnahan, and many more available!
Bump for a final price drop on the remaining cards before I send them to eBay.  Thanks for looking!
